stories.Title: Technology that feels like Nothing
stories.Description: Artistry meets technology in the heart of London. Nothing, the startup that blends beauty and innovation, is about to unveil its latest creation, the Phone 2.
stories.Tweet: Technology that feels like Nothing 📦 Artistry meets technology in the heart of London. Nothing, the startup that blends beauty and innovation, is about to unveil its latest creation, the Phone 2. #startups https://nothing.tech/

stories.Title: The countdown begins for Virgin Galactic
stories.Description: Commercial spaceflight's future is here. Get ready to watch it unfold in real-time! Join Virgin Galactic and a crew of Italian researchers as they embark on an extraordinary mission.

stories.Title: Wanda: A new approach to pruning
stories.Description: Researchers have introduced Wanda, a new method to make language models more efficient. It prunes unnecessary parts without retraining, saving time.
stories.Tweet: Wanda: A new approach to pruning 📦 Researchers have introduced Wanda, a new method to make language models more efficient. It prunes unnecessary parts without retraining, saving time. #ai https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/06/29/meet-wanda-a-simple-and-effective-pruning-approach-for-large-language-models/

stories.Title: A bike with a mind
stories.Description: The fusion of biking and AI steals the show at Eurobike 2023. The integration of ChatGPT in Urtopia's electric bikes promises a ride like never before, with real-time assistance and voice commands.
stories.Tweet: A bike with a mind 📦 The fusion of biking and AI steals the show at Eurobike 2023. stories.Title: Beyond smartphones, is all about chips

stories.Title: Ramon.Space breaks the limits of space computing
stories.Description: With the development of its radiation-hardened computing products, which ESA and NASA have already used, the company is on a mission to enhance in-space computational capabilities.

stories.Title: A new addition to the Tesla experience
stories.Description: The possibility of a Tesla App Store is getting closer as the company adds a "manage third-party apps" section to user settings.

stories.Title: Polestar joins the NACS group
stories.Description: The Swedish EV maker partners with Tesla to bring charging convenience to its drivers, granting access to more than 12,000 Supercharger stations in North America, starting next year.
stories.Tweet: Polestar joins the NACS group 📦 The Swedish EV maker partners with Tesla to bring charging convenience to its drivers, granting access to more than 12,000 Supercharger stations in North America, starting next year. #polestar https://www.cnbc.com/2023/06/29/polestar-moves-to-tesla-charging-standard.html
